procedures.name: Teeth Whitening (Professional Bleaching)
procedures.description: A cosmetic treatment that removes stains and brightens teeth using professional-grade bleaching agents.

procedures.name: Porcelain Veneers
procedures.description: Thin, custom-made ceramic shells bonded to the front of teeth to improve shape, size, and color.

procedures.name: Dental Bonding
procedures.description: A composite resin material is applied to repair chipped, discolored, or slightly misaligned teeth.

procedures.name: Gum Contouring (Gingival Recontouring)
procedures.description: A laser or surgical procedure that reshapes the gum line for a more balanced smile.

procedures.name: Clear Aligners (Invisalign or Similar)
procedures.description: A series of nearly invisible plastic trays that gradually straighten teeth without traditional braces.

procedures.name: Fluoride Treatment
procedures.description: A preventive treatment that strengthens enamel and reduces the risk of cavities in children’s teeth.

procedures.name: Dental Sealants
procedures.description: A thin protective coating applied to molars to prevent cavities by sealing out food and bacteria.

procedures.name: Pulpotomy (Baby Root Canal)
procedures.description: A procedure to remove infected pulp in a baby tooth while preserving the remaining healthy portion.

procedures.name: Stainless Steel Crowns (SSC)
procedures.description: Pre-made metal crowns used to restore severely decayed or damaged primary (baby) teeth.

procedures.name: Interceptive Orthodontics (Space Maintainers)
procedures.description: Appliances that guide proper jaw and tooth development, often used to prevent future orthodontic issues.
